name: Ludum Dare 49 Jam: Unstable
description:
My entry for the Ludum Dare 49 Jam with the theme "Unstable". As far as I know this is my first solo entry...and I guess also my first entry ever?

Made with Construct 3. Visuals mostly in Blender with Aseprite helping management. Collision sound made with sfxr.

Change Log: Fixed the physics so the game doesn't break when you bump into things. Had to also delete the background parallax as Construct 3 reverted to its limited free version and it was either GUI or parallax that had to go.
